name: lucatume/wp-browser
description: WordPress extension of the PhpBrowser class.

suggest.codeception/module-phpbrowser: Codeception 4.0 compatibility; required by the WPBrowser module.
suggest.codeception/module-webdriver: Codeception 4.0 compatibility; required by the WPWebDriver module.
suggest.codeception/module-db: Codeception 4.0 compatibility; required by the WPDb module.
suggest.codeception/module-filesystem: Codeception 4.0 compatibility; required by the WPFilesystem module.
suggest.codeception/module-cli: Codeception 4.0 compatibility; required by the WPCLI module.
suggest.codeception/util-universalframework: Codeception 4.0 compatibility; required by the WordPress framework module.
suggest.gumlet/php-image-resize: To handle runtime image modification in the WPDb::haveAttachmentInDatabase method.
suggest.vlucas/phpdotenv:^4.0: To manage more complex environment file based configuration of the suites.
